pages.text: Hexxit II's author (Jon's) Discord server is available for general questions or discussions about the modpack.$(br2)Please make sure to not go there for bug reporting; go to$(br)the $(l:getting_support)issue tracker$() instead.
Click the link bellow for the Discord server invite.$(br2)Please make sure you are registered to Discord in order to join the server.$(br2) $(br2)           ⇩ ⇩ ⇩
